title: Mac Studio reviews: Impressive power and efficiency, but overkill for many users
content:
Apple will start selling the new Mac Studio this Friday. While users wait to get their hands on this new piece of hardware, journalists and analysts have published their experience with Apple’s latest desktop.

more…

description: Apple will start selling the new Mac Studio Friday. Journalists and analysts have just published their experience with Apple's new desktop.
